Name: Lolita Expedition
About the game: Amazing adventure story with Cthulhu elements! Around a game called„ÄäLolita Expedition„Äã, it tells the story of playing in dreams and the incredible things that all kinds of players encounter here. In order to uncover the truth of the event, we did our best to investigate‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ Game features üåü The traditional round RPG combines the experience of new elements. üåü The half open mode is an adventure world with great freedom. üåü There are hundreds of skills and equipment to enrich the career development system. üåü 12 main characters with different personalities! üåü There are two character liking systems, which can make friends with many characters. üåü Have a lot of hidden treasures for you to dig and collect! üåü Rogue exploration mode will also be unlocked after the clearance of the main plot. üåü Fast tempo, full of fighting experience! In this process, we will continue to obtain unique rewards and understand the personal stories and backgrounds of these characters until we finally harvest their tarot cards and favors. Players can even meet certain conditions,Invite one of them to spend the Double Seventh Festival with himself! This is a RPG game developed by GIRLSOUL studio's 'Shuyi' in 2008.
